00044 const char CellStoreV0::DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC[10]           = { 'D','a','t','a','-','-','-','-','-','-' };
00045 const char CellStoreV0::INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC[10]    = { 'I','d','x','F','i','x','-','-','-','-' };
00046 const char CellStoreV0::INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC[10] = { 'I','d','x','V','a','r','-','-','-','-' };

00052 CellStoreV0::CellStoreV0(Filesystem *filesys) : m_filesys(filesys), m_filename(), m_fd(-1), m_index(),
00053   m_compressor(0), m_buffer(0), m_fix_index_buffer(0), m_var_index_buffer(0),
00054   m_outstanding_appends(0), m_offset(0), m_last_key(0), m_file_length(0), m_disk_usage(0), m_file_id(0), m_uncompressed_blocksize(0) {
00055   m_file_id = FileBlockCache::get_next_file_id();
00056   assert(sizeof(float) == 4);
00057 }

00061 CellStoreV0::~CellStoreV0() {
00062   try {
00063     delete m_compressor;
00064 
00065     if (m_fd != -1)
00066       m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00067   }
00068   catch (Exception &e) {
00069     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Error closing DFS client: "<< e << HT_END;
00070   }

00099 int CellStoreV0::create(const char *fname, uint32_t blocksize, const std::string &compressor) {
00100   m_buffer.reserve(blocksize*4);
00101 
00102   m_fd = -1;
00103   m_offset = 0;
00104   m_last_key = 0;
00105   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00106   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(blocksize);
00107 
00108   m_uncompressed_data = 0.0;
00109   m_compressed_data = 0.0;
00110 
00111   m_trailer.clear();
00112   m_trailer.blocksize = blocksize;
00113   m_uncompressed_blocksize = blocksize;
00114 
00115   m_filename = fname;
00116 
00117   m_start_row = "";
00118   m_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00119 
00120   if (compressor.empty())
00121     m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00122         "lzo", m_compressor_args);
00123   else
00124     m_trailer.compression_type = CompressorFactory::parse_block_codec_spec(
00125         compressor, m_compressor_args);
00126 
00127   m_compressor = CompressorFactory::create_block_codec(
00128       (BlockCompressionCodec::Type)m_trailer.compression_type,
00129       m_compressor_args);
00130 
00131   try { m_fd = m_filesys->create(m_filename, true, -1, -1, -1); }
00132   catch (Exception &e) {
00133     HT_ERRORF("Error creating cellstore: %s", e.what());
00134     return e.code();
00135   }
00136   return Error::OK;
00137 }

00140 int CellStoreV0::add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, int64_t real_timestamp) {
00141   EventPtr event_ptr;
00142   DynamicBuffer zbuf;
00143 
00144   (void)real_timestamp;
00145 
00146   if (m_buffer.fill() > m_uncompressed_blocksize) {
00147     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00148 
00149     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00150 
00151     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00152     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00153     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00154     m_buffer.clear();
00155 
00156     uint64_t llval = ((uint64_t)m_trailer.blocksize * (uint64_t)m_uncompressed_data) / (uint64_t)m_compressed_data;
00157     m_uncompressed_blocksize = (uint32_t)llval;
00158 
00159     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00160       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00161         HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(), Hypertable::Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00162         return -1;
00163       }
00164       m_outstanding_appends--;
00165     }
00166 
00167     size_t zlen = zbuf.fill();
00168     StaticBuffer send_buf(zbuf);
00169 
00170     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00171     catch (Exception &e) {
00172       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s",
00173                 m_filename.c_str(), e.what());
00174       return -1;
00175     }
00176     m_outstanding_appends++;
00177     m_offset += zlen;
00178   }
00179 
00180   size_t key_len = key.length();
00181   size_t value_len = value.length();
00182 
00183   m_buffer.ensure(key_len + value_len);
00184 
00185   m_last_key.ptr = m_buffer.add_unchecked(key.ptr, key_len);
00186   m_buffer.add_unchecked(value.ptr, value_len);
00187 
00188   m_trailer.total_entries++;
00189 
00190   return 0;
00191 }

00195 int CellStoreV0::finalize(Timestamp &timestamp) {
00196   EventPtr event_ptr;
00197   int error = -1;
00198   size_t zlen;
00199   DynamicBuffer zbuf(0);
00200   size_t len;
00201   uint8_t *base;
00202   ByteString key;
00203   StaticBuffer send_buf;
00204 
00205   if (m_buffer.fill() > 0) {
00206     BlockCompressionHeader header(DATA_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00207 
00208     add_index_entry(m_last_key, m_offset);
00209 
00210     m_uncompressed_data += (float)m_buffer.fill();
00211     m_compressor->deflate(m_buffer, zbuf, header);
00212     m_compressed_data += (float)zbuf.fill();
00213 
00214     zlen = zbuf.fill();
00215     send_buf = zbuf;
00216 
00217     if (m_outstanding_appends >= MAX_APPENDS_OUTSTANDING) {
00218       if (!m_sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00219         HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(), Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr).c_str());
00220         goto abort;
00221       }
00222       m_outstanding_appends--;
00223     }
00224 
00225     try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00226     catch (Exception &e) {
00227       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing to DFS file '%s' : %s", m_filename.c_str(),
00228                 e.what());
00229       goto abort;
00230     }
00231     m_outstanding_appends++;
00232     m_offset += zlen;
00233   }
00234 
00235   m_trailer.fix_index_offset = m_offset;
00236   m_trailer.timestamp = timestamp;
00237   m_trailer.compression_ratio = m_compressed_data / m_uncompressed_data;
00238   m_trailer.version = 0;
00239 
00243   base = m_fix_index_buffer.release(&len);
00244   m_fix_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00245   m_fix_index_buffer.add_unchecked(base, len);
00246   delete [] base;
00247   base = m_var_index_buffer.release(&len);
00248   m_var_index_buffer.reserve(len);
00249   m_var_index_buffer.add_unchecked(base, len);
00250   delete [] base;
00251 
00255   {
00256     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00257     m_compressor->deflate(m_fix_index_buffer, zbuf, header);
00258   }
00259 
00260   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00261   send_buf = zbuf;
00262 
00263   try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf, 0, &m_sync_handler); }
00264   catch (Exception &e) {
00265     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00266     goto abort;
00267   }
00268   m_outstanding_appends++;
00269   m_offset += zlen;
00270 
00274   {
00275     BlockCompressionHeader header(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC);
00276     m_trailer.var_index_offset = m_offset;
00277     m_compressor->deflate(m_var_index_buffer, zbuf, header, m_trailer.size());
00278   }
00279 
00283   uint32_t offset;
00284   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr = m_fix_index_buffer.base;
00285   m_var_index_buffer.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.base;
00286   for (size_t i=0; i<m_trailer.index_entries; i++) {
00287     // variable portion
00288     key.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00289     m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key.length();
00290     // fixed portion (e.g. offset)
00291     memcpy(&offset, m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, sizeof(offset));
00292     m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00293     m_index.insert(m_index.end(), IndexMap::value_type(key, offset));
00294     if (i == m_trailer.index_entries/2) {
00295       record_split_row(ByteString(m_var_index_buffer.ptr));
00296     }
00297   }
00298 
00299   // deallocate fix index data
00300   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00301 
00302   // write filter_offset (empty for now)
00303   m_trailer.filter_offset = m_offset + zbuf.fill();
00304 
00305   //
00306   m_trailer.serialize(zbuf.ptr);
00307   zbuf.ptr += m_trailer.size();
00308 
00309   zlen = zbuf.fill();
00310   send_buf = zbuf;
00311 
00312   try { m_filesys->append(m_fd, send_buf); }
00313   catch (Exception &e) {
00314     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00315     goto abort;
00316   }
00317   m_outstanding_appends++;
00318   m_offset += zlen;
00319 
00321   try { m_filesys->close(m_fd); }
00322   catch (Exception &e) {
00323     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00324     goto abort;
00325   }
00326 
00328   m_file_length = m_offset;
00329 
00331   try { m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename); }
00332   catch (Exception &e) {
00333     HT_ERROR_OUT << "Error reopening cellstore: "<<  e << HT_END;
00334     goto abort;
00335   }
00336 
00337   m_disk_usage = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00338   error = 0;
00339 
00340  abort:
00341   delete m_compressor;
00342   m_compressor = 0;
00343 
00344   return error;
00345 }

00348 
00352 void CellStoreV0::add_index_entry(const ByteString key, uint32_t offset) {
00353 
00354   size_t key_len = key.length();
00355   m_var_index_buffer.ensure(key_len);
00356   memcpy(m_var_index_buffer.ptr, key.ptr, key_len);
00357   m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key_len;
00358 
00359   // Serialize offset into fix index buffer
00360   m_fix_index_buffer.ensure(sizeof(offset));
00361   memcpy(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, &offset, sizeof(offset));
00362   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00363 
00364   m_trailer.index_entries++;
00365 }

00372 int CellStoreV0::open(const char *fname, const char *start_row, const char *end_row) {
00373   m_start_row = (start_row) ? start_row : "";
00374   m_end_row = (end_row) ? end_row : Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00375 
00376   m_fd = -1;
00377 
00378   m_filename = fname;
00379 
00381   try { m_file_length = m_filesys->length(m_filename); }
00382   catch (Exception &e) {
00383     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00384     goto abort;
00385   }
00386 
00387   if (m_file_length < m_trailer.size()) {
00388     HT_ERRORF("Bad length of CellStore file '%s' - %lld", m_filename.c_str(),
00389               m_file_length);
00390     goto abort;
00391   }
00392 
00394   try { m_fd =  m_filesys->open(m_filename); }
00395   catch (Exception &e) {
00396     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00397     goto abort;
00398   }
00399 
00403   {
00404     uint32_t len;
00405     uint8_t *trailer_buf = new uint8_t [m_trailer.size()];
00406 
00407     try {
00408       len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, trailer_buf, m_trailer.size(),
00409                              m_file_length - m_trailer.size());
00410     }
00411     catch (Exception &e) {
00412       HT_ERRORF("Problem reading trailer for CellStore '%s': %s",
00413                 m_filename.c_str(), e.what());
00414       delete [] trailer_buf;
00415       goto abort;
00416     }
00417 
00418     if (len != m_trailer.size()) {
00419       HT_ERRORF("Problem reading trailer for CellStore file '%s' - only read "
00420                 "%d of %d bytes", m_filename.c_str(), len, m_trailer.size());
00421       delete [] trailer_buf;
00422       goto abort;
00423     }
00424 
00425     m_trailer.deserialize(trailer_buf);
00426     delete [] trailer_buf;
00427   }
00428 
00430   if (m_trailer.version != 0) {
00431     HT_ERRORF("Unsupported CellStore version (%d) for file '%s'",
00432               m_trailer.version, fname);
00433     goto abort;
00434   }
00435   if (!(m_trailer.fix_index_offset < m_trailer.var_index_offset &&
00436         m_trailer.var_index_offset < m_file_length)) {
00437     HT_ERRORF("Bad index offsets in CellStore trailer fix=%lld, var=%lld, "
00438               "length=%lld, file='%s'", m_trailer.fix_index_offset,
00439               m_trailer.var_index_offset, m_file_length, fname);
00440     goto abort;
00441   }
00442 
00443   return Error::OK;
00444 
00445  abort:
00446   return Error::LOCAL_IO_ERROR;
00447 }

00449 
00450 int CellStoreV0::load_index() {
00451   int error = -1;
00452   uint32_t amount;
00453   uint8_t *fix_end;
00454   uint8_t *var_end;
00455   uint32_t len;
00456   BlockCompressionHeader header;
00457   ByteString key;
00458 
00459   m_compressor = create_block_compression_codec();
00460 
00461   amount = (m_file_length-m_trailer.size()) - m_trailer.fix_index_offset;
00462 
00463   try {
00464     DynamicBuffer buf(amount);
00466     len = m_filesys->pread(m_fd, buf.ptr, amount, m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00467 
00468     if (len != amount)
00469       HT_THROWF(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, "Error loading index for "
00470                 "CellStore '%s' : tried to read %d but only got %d",
00471                 m_filename.c_str(), amount, len);
00473     buf.ptr += (m_trailer.var_index_offset - m_trailer.fix_index_offset);
00474     m_compressor->inflate(buf, m_fix_index_buffer, header);
00475 
00476     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_FIXED_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00477       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, "");
00478 
00480     DynamicBuffer vbuf(0, false);
00481     amount = (m_file_length-m_trailer.size()) - m_trailer.var_index_offset;
00482     vbuf.base = buf.ptr;
00483     vbuf.ptr = buf.ptr + amount;
00484 
00485     m_compressor->inflate(vbuf, m_var_index_buffer, header);
00486 
00487     if (!header.check_magic(INDEX_VARIABLE_BLOCK_MAGIC))
00488       HT_THROW(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_MAGIC, "");
00489   }
00490   catch (Exception &e) {
00491     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Error reading trailer for cellstore '"<< m_filename
00492                  <<"': "<<  e << HT_END;
00493     goto abort;
00494   }
00495 
00496   m_index.clear();
00497 
00498   uint32_t offset;
00499 
00500   // record end offsets for sanity checking and reset ptr
00501   fix_end = m_fix_index_buffer.ptr;
00502   m_fix_index_buffer.ptr = m_fix_index_buffer.base;
00503   var_end = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00504   m_var_index_buffer.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.base;
00505 
00506   for (size_t i=0; i< m_trailer.index_entries; i++) {
00507     assert(m_fix_index_buffer.ptr < fix_end);
00508     assert(m_var_index_buffer.ptr < var_end);
00509 
00510     // Deserialized cell key (variable portion)
00511     key.ptr = m_var_index_buffer.ptr;
00512     m_var_index_buffer.ptr += key.length();
00513 
00514     // Deserialize offset
00515     memcpy(&offset, m_fix_index_buffer.ptr, sizeof(offset));
00516     m_fix_index_buffer.ptr += sizeof(offset);
00517 
00518     m_index.insert(m_index.end(), IndexMap::value_type(key, offset));
00519   }
00520 
00524   {
00525     uint32_t start = 0;
00526     uint32_t end = (uint32_t)m_file_length;
00527     size_t start_row_length = m_start_row.length() + 1;
00528     size_t end_row_length = m_end_row.length() + 1;
00529     DynamicBuffer dbuf(7 + std::max(start_row_length, end_row_length));
00530     ByteString bs;
00531     CellStoreV0::IndexMap::const_iterator iter, mid_iter, end_iter;
00532 
00533     dbuf.clear();
00534     append_as_byte_string(dbuf, m_start_row.c_str(), start_row_length);
00535     bs.ptr = dbuf.base;
00536     iter = m_index.upper_bound(bs);
00537     start = (*iter).second;
00538 
00539     dbuf.clear();
00540     append_as_byte_string(dbuf, m_end_row.c_str(), end_row_length);
00541     bs.ptr = dbuf.base;
00542     if ((end_iter = m_index.lower_bound(bs)) == m_index.end())
00543       end = m_file_length;
00544     else
00545       end = (*end_iter).second;
00546 
00547     m_disk_usage = end - start;
00548 
00549     size_t i=0;
00550     for (mid_iter=iter; iter!=end_iter; ++iter,++i) {
00551       if ((i%2)==0)
00552         ++mid_iter;
00553     }
00554     if (mid_iter != m_index.end())
00555       record_split_row((*mid_iter).first);
00556   }
00557 
00558   error = 0;
00559 
00560  abort:
00561   delete m_compressor;
00562   m_compressor = 0;
00563   delete [] m_fix_index_buffer.release();
00564   return error;
00565 }

00567 
00571 void CellStoreV0::display_block_info() {
00572   ByteString last_key;
00573   uint32_t last_offset = 0;
00574   uint32_t block_size;
00575   size_t i=0;
00576   for (IndexMap::const_iterator iter = m_index.begin(); iter != m_index.end(); iter++) {
00577     if (last_key) {
00578       block_size = (*iter).second - last_offset;
00579       cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size << " row=" << last_key.str() << endl;
00580       i++;
00581     }
00582     last_offset = (*iter).second;
00583     last_key = (*iter).first;
00584   }
00585   if (last_key) {
00586     block_size = m_trailer.filter_offset - last_offset;
00587     cout << i << ": offset=" << last_offset << " size=" << block_size << " row=" << last_key.str() << endl;
00588   }
00589 }

00592 
00593 void CellStoreV0::record_split_row(const ByteString key) {
00594   const uint8_t *ptr;
00595   key.decode_length(&ptr);
00596   std::string split_row = (const char *)ptr;
00597   if (split_row > m_start_row && split_row < m_end_row)
00598     m_split_row = split_row;
00599   //cout << "record_split_row = " << m_split_row << endl;
00600 }
